frontmatter.title: Finding My Voice
frontmatter.short: In my early 20's my first blog failed before it ever started. I struggled with finding my voice. To be candid, I had a voice, just not one I could publish. I feared my voice would betray me as youthful, inexperienced, and stupid, because I was all these things.
